edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prf.bc

Class BcAES

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prf.bc.BcPRP
      • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prf.bc.BcAES
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AES, PrfFixed, PrpFixed, PseudorandomFunction, PseudorandomPermutation

    public final class BcAES
extends BcPRP
implements AES
    Concrete class of prf family for AES. This class wraps the implementation of Bouncy castle.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Meital Levy)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BcAES()
      Passes the AESEngine of BC to the abstract super class

      Receives random object to use.
      BcAES(java.lang.String randNumGenAlg)
      Receives name of random algorithm to use.
